CustomField.description: OCS Generated Field for Genesys Routing
CustomField.formula: IF( ProductId__r.CommercialCode__c = "6100", 'PYMES', CASE ( ProductId__r.TechnicalCode__c , '00515', IF( CONTAINS("99999:00001:00004:00005:00006:00001:00002:00003", ProductId__r.CommercialCode__c), "PYMES", ProductId__r.GroupDescription__c ), '00516', IF( CONTAINS("99999:00001", ProductId__r.CommercialCode__c), "PYMES", ProductId__r.GroupDescription__c ), '00517', IF( CONTAINS("99998:99999:00001:00002", ProductId__r.CommercialCode__c), "PYMES", ProductId__r.GroupDescription__c ), '00580', IF( CONTAINS("00001:00002:00003:00004", ProductId__r.CommercialCode__c), "PYMES", ProductId__r.GroupDescription__c ), '00589', IF( CONTAINS("00001", ProductId__r.CommercialCode__c), "PYMES", ProductId__r.GroupDescription__c ), '00591', IF( CONTAINS("99999:00001", ProductId__r.CommercialCode__c), "PYMES", ProductId__r.GroupDescription__c ), '00598', IF( CONTAINS("99999:00001", ProductId__r.CommercialCode__c), "PYMES", ProductId__r.GroupDescription__c ), ProductId__r.GroupDescription__c ) )
CustomField.label: Policy Type
